Dr. Lloyd Morey, President
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear President Morey:
Thanks for your letter of July 16th in which you
comment upon the progress report of the W. K. Kellogg
Foundation - National Association of Educational BroadÂ¬
casters project which is operating on your campus. We
appreciate your interest in this project.
Today I am authorizing the payment of our grant for the
195^-1955 fiscal year. We are pleased to ;-nov from the
reports which we have received from Mr. Skornia the
fine progress which has been made and the many evidences
of cooperation at your University.
Sincerely and with best wishes.
MFS/fh
cc - Mr. H. J. Skornia
Maurice F. Seay
